detectors.description:
SafeMath.minus(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#24-28) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#25)

StandardToken.executeTransfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#157-165) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[_from] = balances[_from].minus(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#161)
	- balances[_to] = balances[_to].plus(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#162)
detectors.markdown:
[StandardToken.executeTransfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#L157-L165) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[_from] = balances[_from].minus(_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#L161)
	- [balances[_to] = balances[_to].plus(_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#L162)

detectors.description: Parameter StandardToken.balanceOf(address)._address (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BurnableToken.burn(uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#191) is not in mixedCase
Parameter MintableToken.mint(address,uint256)._to (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#238) is not in mixedCase

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#89-91)
	- ERC20Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#46)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#47)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#130-134)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#49)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#116-122)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#101-103)
	- ERC20Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#50)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- BurnableToken.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StandardMintableToken.sol#191-202)
